adrFormatAddress: 251 Central Park W #1C, New York, NY 10024, USA

originalText.text: Dr. Brad is a great podiatrist, and definitely a people’s person as well as the staff there. Everyone there adapts to each patient that comes and goes and shows nothing but care and love making you feel comfortable throughout the visit. Been coming here every for a year now and have been happy with all my visits.

text.text: Dr. Brad is a great podiatrist, and definitely a people’s person as well as the staff there. Everyone there adapts to each patient that comes and goes and shows nothing but care and love making you feel comfortable throughout the visit. originalText.text: My daughter completed two bunion surgeries in a few months with Dr. Brad Sheaffer. This doctor is such an unusual doctor and human being. The care he took made my daughter at ease as not being able to walk during recovery is challenging. We cannot recommend Dr. Sheaffer more highly. You will thank me for my high recommendation. His staff including hospital staff is impeccable and so caring. Best during your surgical journey. -Paige and patient Audrey Bluhdorn

text.text: My daughter completed two bunion surgeries in a few months with Dr. Brad Sheaffer. This doctor is such an unusual doctor and human being. His staff including hospital staff is impeccable and so caring. Best during your surgical journey. -Paige and patient Audrey Bluhdorn

originalText.text:
I recently told Dr. Brad I been having some issues with a few toes. He said, come on in and let’s take a look. His team took several X-rays of both feet. I was then taken into an exam room where Dr. B looked at my feet. He examined the toes and offered a few options to treat the issues.

I really appreciated the time he spent with me to diagnose my issues. He is TOEtally the best out there. He is warm, kind, caring and very friendly. He made me felt at ease too!

The staff in the office is also so very friendly. They were willing to help me and made me feel very comfortable.

The office vibe is awesome. The music that was playing made me feel like I wanted to dance! It doesn’t feel like you’re walking into a doctors office but rather a friends home. I highly recommend Dr. Brad and his incredible staff for your next foot or ankle issue.

text.text:

originalText.text: First off, the location is so perfect and ideal on a beautiful street right across from Central Park and the office is so clean and beautifully decorated! The receptionist was so very friendly and offered water and took our jackets. Doctor Brad Schaeffer is extremely smart and knowledgeable in his specialty. You will be in the best of hands and very well taken care of!

originalText.text:
I cannot tell you how THANKFUL I am to have found Dr. Schaeffer! I found a lump in my foot that terrified me and the doctors in my area would not listen and did not seem to care!

I traveled over 2 hours to meet Dr. Schaeffer and would have traveled another 10 hours because he was worth every second!

He CARES!

His office and staff are a 10/10 and made me feel so comfortable and dismissed like I had been feeling. I am feeling great and tell everyone about Central Park SOLE and Dr. Brad.

Thank you!
